channel.title: Lockerz
channel.description: anyone wanna join lockerz? You get free things by answering one question a day and it's free. It's invite only so just post your e-mail and i'll give you an invite.

item.title: Lockerz
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You aren’t allowed advertise or ask questions in this section. If people wish to get a lockerz invite they can PM you, etc.

Read full topic

It’s not really advertising though. :P[/quote]

ily but look in title <3.
